long_description: Warmers Barnacle Half-Finger paddling gloves with specialized padding, quick-drying materials and excellent grip are perfect for paddlers of all types. Open-finger design affords greater dexterity and control. 4-way stretch spandex and synthetic leather backs provide a smooth fit. Amara(R) synthetic leather palms with shaped padding feature silicone rubber tactiles on palms for enhanced grip and protection. Polysuede pads at thumb, forefinger and palm reduces chafing; terry-looped thumbs wipe away sweat and spray. Warmers Barnacle Half-Finger paddling gloves feature neoprene cuffs with rip-and-stick closures that seal around wrists for a secure, custom fit.
short_description: Warmers Barnacle Half-Finger paddling gloves with specialized padding, quick-drying materials and excellent grip are perfect for paddlers of all types.
